posts.title: Pinocchio
posts.plot: Despite guidance from the Blue Fairy and the love of his father, a wooden puppet's curious spirit leads him into one wild adventure after another.
posts.actors: Roberto Benigni, Nicoletta Braschi, Mino Bellei, Carlo Giuffrè

posts.title: Batman Begins
posts.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
posts.actors: Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Katie Holmes

posts.title: Jurassic Park
posts.plot: A pragmatic Paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
posts.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough

posts.title: Pippo Barzizza e Una Vita per la Musica
posts.plot: From the Pathè Baby 9.5 archive footage shot by Pippo Barzizza since 1928, this short film shows the Pippo's life with his wife Tatina, and his daughter Isa Barzizza. The title was written ...

posts.title: Superman
posts.plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
posts.actors: Marlon Brando, Gene Hackman, Christopher Reeve, Ned Beatty
